dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S2864 IS: Pathways to Paychecks Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Cassidy introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

form.official-title: To amend the Wagner-Peyser Act to allow States the flexibility to use staffing arrangements that best suit their needs, for employment service offices.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Pathways to Paychecks Act.
Section 9 of the Wagner-Peyser Act (29 U.S.C. 49h) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subsection.text: States may use State merit staff, or other staff that meet the requirements applicable to Federal contractors, to carry out the duties of employment service offices under this Act.
